query:
UPDATE categoryColors SET color = CASE 
  WHEN category = 'preparation' THEN '#10B981'
  WHEN category = 'structure' THEN '#3B82F6'
  WHEN category = 'architecture' THEN '#EAB308'
  WHEN category = 'mep' THEN '#EF4444'
  WHEN category = 'other' THEN '#6B7280'
END
WHERE projectId = 4;
command:
